definition: to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

sentences.english: NVOCC is also a carrier because it can open B/L.
sentences.chinese: 無船承運人也是承運人因爲他可以簽發提單。

sentences.english: You make out your own bills of lading, I suppose?
sentences.chinese: 我想你們是自己填制提單的吧？

sentences.english: The buyer should pay total amount to seller by T/T within 10 days after receipt of the concerning original B/L.
sentences.chinese: 買方應在收到正本提單後10天內電匯支付全部貨款。

sentences.english: ii. A bill of lading indicating that transhipment will or may take place is acceptable, even if the credit prohibits transhipment
sentences.chinese: 銀行可以接受註明將要發生或可能發生轉運的提單。

sentences.english: Releasing goods without presenting original B/L is regarded as a "Cancer" of the modern B/L system.
sentences.chinese: 無單放貨問題被稱爲現代提單制度的“癌症”。

sentences.english: BACKDATED BILL OF LADING NOT ACCEPTABLE。
BILL OF LADING IS ISSUED BY FREIGHT FORWARDER, THIS WAS PROHIBITED BY L/C.
sentences.chinese: 提單由運輸行出具，這是信用證所禁止的。

sentences.english: Delivery date is considered as the date of Airway Bill (AWB).
sentences.chinese: 交貨期視爲航空提單的日期。

sentences.english: These are Antedated B/L and Advanced B/L.
sentences.chinese: 這便構成了倒籤提單和預借提單。

sentences.english: These are Antedated B/L and Advanced B/L.
sentences.chinese: 這便構成了倒籤提單和預借提單。

sentences.english: All documents except Bill of Lading should show this L/C number and date。
sentences.chinese: 除了提單外的所有單據都須顯示信用證號碼和日期。

sentences.english: The bill of lading must contain the name of actual port of discharge.
sentences.chinese: 提單列明具體的卸貨港是有必要的。

sentences.english: The ship-owner has issued a clean on board bill of lading.
sentences.chinese: 船東已簽發了清潔裝運提單。

sentences.english: Suggestions are made for perfecting the demurrage clause of the B/L.
sentences.chinese: 並對如何完善提單中的滯期費條款提出了簡單的設想。

sentences.english: One copy of nonnegotiable or duplicate copy of clean on board bill of lading for crude oil.
sentences.chinese: 一份不可轉讓的或副本的原油已裝船清潔提單。

sentences.english: We have pleasure in enclosing herewith a Bill of Lading covering 50 bales of cotton.
sentences.chinese: 茲隨信附去50包棉花的提單一張。

pinyin: Quan2 min2 Jian4 kang1 Bao3 xian3

definition: abbr. of 資訊工程|资讯工程[zi1 xun4 gong1 cheng2]
